channel.title: A few questiions
channel.description:
- How can I move the position of shops?
- How can I change a specific places wildy level ? What i mean is that since I owe a pvp server, I want to make varrock and camy non wildy, but I don't know how.
If you can help me on both, can help a lot.
Thanks.

item.title: A few questiions
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

Ohhh Ok that helped alot, thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questiions
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

[quote=“Achmed, post:1, topic:328645”]ok,
spawn = 2263 3017 4824 0 3021 4828 2975 4820 1
Spawn = Npc Absx AbsY n/a AbsX Absy Absx Abxy forgot[/quote]

spawn = npcid   X-coord   Y-coord   height   LeftupX   LeftupY   RightdownX   RightdownY   Walktype

The leftup rightdown part is where you set the coordinates in which the NPC may move, if the walktype is set to 1.
Walktype 0 means the NPC will stay where it is, this also means you can just make the leftup etc coords 0.
Walktype 1 means the NPC will randomly walk around the area that you entered.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questiions
item.dc:creator: @Motokid126 Motokid126
item.description:
@Motokid126 wrote:

I’m having the same problem too, i mean i need to know how to move them also,
What does each thing mean, this might help both of us…Example:

spawn = 2263 3017 4824 0 3021 4828 2975 4820 1

Which is the coords and which is the Npc? theres 9 sets of numbers there, what does each one mean?

Read full topic

item.title: A few questiions
item.dc:creator: @igli igli
item.description:
@igli wrote:

[quote=“Achmed, post:2, topic:328630”]How can I move the position of shops?

Go to Config>Autospawn.cfg open it then find the Npc and then changed that coords[/quote]

It says damaged or unknown.
